title: [After Thoughts, Pilot Deck]
description: A section of the floor has fallen away, forming a ramp leading down to the main deck.  The hammered copper roof of the cabin is pitted and riddled with holes, supported by four massive pillars of weathered black ash.  The ship's wheel is almost nonexistant, just a remnant hub with fragments of what used to be the spokes

A section of the floor has fallen away, forming a ramp leading down to the main deck.  The hammered copper roof of the cabin is pitted and riddled with holes, supported by four massive pillars of weathered black ash.  The ship's wheel is almost nonexistant, just a remnant hub with fragments of what used to be the spokes.
